attributes.action: Make Covid vaccinations a 24 hour operation
attributes.additional_details: Today the Government announced that there was "no clamour" for vaccinations after 8pm.  Having shielded since last March I am confident that millions of us are willing to do whatever it takes to get protection from this virus, expediting the recovery of the UK.
attributes.background: Inoculations for Covid 19 should be available around the clock.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
